name: Repair My Body
description:
Try to beat your Highscore in this arcade style game, in wich you prevent your patients body from beeing overtaken by a strange virus causing flower to grow out of its victims pores.

how to play:

-click on flowers to gain points

-blue = 10 points and disapears quickly

-orange = 10 points and deadly

-pink = 5 points and slow

p.s:

-vhs shader from https://github.com/Ahopness/GodotRetro

-fonts from http://www.publicdomainfiles.com/browse.php?q=all&s=0&o=popular&a=all&m=1

-desktop version coming soon (:
